original_text: When he was taken out of the highway, all the people went on after Joab to pursue Sheba the son of Bichri.
korean_text: 아마사를 큰길에서 옮겨가매 사람들이 다 요압을 따라 비그리의 아들 세바를 뒤쫓아가니라

sentences.original_text: When he was taken out of the highway
all the people went on after Joab
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 백성은 요압을 따라 계속 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: to pursue Sheba the son of Bichri
